Year : 11 April 2008 
Genre : Adventure 
Developer : Himalaya Studios 
Publisher : Himalaya Studios / Russobit M

Publication Type : Repack 
Language : Russian / English

Medicine : Not required
System requirements:
Operating System: Windows / XPsp2 / Vista / 7
Processor: Pentium 800 MHz or higher
RAM: 256 MB
Hard disk space: 1.5 GB
Sound device: compatible with DirectX
Video card: GeForce 3 or Radeon 8500
Description:
You will be able to personally meet with Al, learn about his plight and understand: in 40 years, with a bald head, bifocals and worn jeans from old age, he still lives with his aged mama who said they were small and brazenly selects all the money . Of course - no wife from Al is not, and women in general are not interested in them, but very transvestites ... Help amusing companion Al escape from loneliness and go on an adventure you can in this wonderful game.
Features:

* Reckless adventure in the style of "Western" 
* Classics of the genre with a slight touch of mysticism 
* Immolation prairie landscapes 
* Secrets, secrets and Indian trap 
* Over 120 expertly traced locations 
* Soundtracks, immersed in the atmosphere of the Wild West 
* 9 episodes exciting adventure, full of passion and unrestrained firing 
* Quintessence of humor and gameplay style quest masterpieces end of XX century

Description:
A new small toy from Himalaya Studios. 
Mayor Arizona (Anozira) really wants to breathe new life into your small town and needs your help. Help Al Emmo (Al Emmo) and other locals to lure tourists in Arizona. Explore the town to learn about the local attractions, places of interest and use your Hidden Object skills to attract visitors and help local business survive. 
To all fans of the genre "I'm looking for" dedicated!
